turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about July 2018 Lombok earthquake.
turn.1: Which hospital was damaged in the July 2018 Lombok earthquake?
turn.2: Soedjono regional hospital while in Sembalun a Community Health Centre was significantly damaged.
turn.3: What was the scale of the aftershocks?
turn.4: Authorities confirmed that 276 moderate aftershocks from 5.0–5.5 Mw were recorded by the Indonesian Agency for Meteorology, Climatology and Geophysics (BMKG).
turn.6: The largest aftershock at a magnitude 5.7 Mw recorded at 10:16 local time.
turn.8: On 3 August, officials confirmed that more than 500 aftershocks had been recorded.
turn.9: Were there any deaths due to the earthquake?
turn.10: Authorities confirmed that a Malaysian tourist was killed by a falling wall.
turn.12: The Indonesian National Board for Disaster Management (BNPB) confirmed that 10 people were killed and 40 people were injured.
